_header: Upon my right side I me lay
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary on going to bed — ten lines

BLHar541.First Lines: Vpon my Ryght syde y me leye blesid lady to the y prayffor the teres that ye lete vpon yowre swete sonnys feete…
BLHar541.Last Lines: …Owre lorde is the frwte oure lady is the treeBlessid be the blossom that sprange lady of the
